summary: Children's stories in cartoon, about adventures experienced by two children while looking for their kite.
cast: Manuel Bermúdez 'Boliche'|Rafael de Penagos|Ángela González|Eloísa Mateos|José Moratalla|Eduardo Moreno|Joaquín Portillo 'Top'|Carlos Revilla|Claudio Rodríguez|Ángel Ter|Selica Torcal|Matilde F. Vilariño
title: Mágica aventura
